full_summary:
### Request for Proposal for Agricultural Tractors

#### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4149811856
* **Publication Date:** August 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** September 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Number:** 2

#### Background

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is an amendment to the original solicitation for the supply of five agricultural tractors of various configurations for delivery to Correctional Service Canada at four locations. The RFP is issued under the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HS-18AGTR/A, and suppliers with an existing SA are required to submit a proposal in response to this RFP.

#### Requirements

* The Correctional Service Canada requires the supply of five agricultural tractors of various configurations for delivery to four locations:
	+ Abbotsford
	+ Truro
	+ Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines
	+ Victoria

#### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Debriefing

Bidders who are shortlisted will be notified and invited to attend a debriefing session. Bidders who are not shortlisted will be advised of the outcome in writing.

#### IMPORTANT NOTICE

Bidders are advised that all supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EDT on September 7, 2023. Bids received after 2:00 PM EDT will be considered non-responsive.

#### Trade Agreements

This RFP is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Closing Information

The RFP closes on September 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. The Contracting Authority can be contacted at dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
